meanings.sent1: She prefocuses on her homework before starting.
meanings.sent2: He always prefocuses on his goals for the day in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The student prefocuses on studying so much that they forget to eat!
meanings.sent4: Her mind prefocuses on the upcoming exam like a laser beam.
meanings.sent5: Prefocusing on the task at hand helps improve productivity.

meanings.definition: To concentrate on something before it happens
meanings.sent1: Before the game, the coach prefocuses the team on their strategy.
meanings.sent2: She prefocuses on the presentation to ensure it goes smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The cat prefocuses on the toy mouse, ready to pounce.
meanings.sent4: His mind prefocuses on the future like a crystal ball.
meanings.sent5: Prefocusing on the positive outcomes can reduce anxiety.
